9 ros::NodeHandle* n;
10 ros::Subscriber sub_legs_pose;
11 ros::Publisher pub_cmd_vel;
12 ros::Publisher pub_head_pose;
13 ros::Subscriber sub_pot_fields;
14 bool move_head = false;
15 bool pot_fields = false;
16 
17 
18 float rej_force=0.0;
19 
20 //pot fields constant
21 float k_linear_y=1.1;
22 
23 geometry_msgs::Twist calculate_speeds(float goal_x, float goal_y)
24 {
25  //Control constants
26  //float alpha = 0.6548;
27  float alpha =0.8;//= 0.9;
28  float beta = 0.3;
29  float max_angular = 0.6;//0.7
30 
31 
32  //Error calculation
33  float angle_error = atan2(goal_y, goal_x);
34  float distance = sqrt(goal_x*goal_x + goal_y*goal_y);
35  distance -= 0.9;
36  if(distance < 0) distance = 0; //Robot will stop at 0.8 m from walker
37  if(distance > 0.35) distance = 0.35; //Distance is used as speed, so, robot will move at 0.5 max
38  geometry_msgs::Twist result;
39  if(distance > 0)
40  {
41  result.linear.x = distance * exp(-(angle_error * angle_error) / alpha);
42  result.linear.y = pot_fields? k_linear_y*rej_force:0;
43  result.angular.z = max_angular * (2 / (1 + exp(-angle_error / beta)) - 1);
44  }
45  else
46  {
47  result.linear.x = 0;
48  result.linear.y = 0;
49  result.angular.z = max_angular * (2 / (1 + exp(-angle_error / beta)) - 1);
50  }
51  return result;
52 }
53 
54 void callback_legs_pose(const geometry_msgs::PointStamped::ConstPtr& msg)
55 {
56  if(msg->header.frame_id.compare("base_range_sensor_link") != 0)
57  {
58  std::cout << "LegFinder.->WARNING!! Leg positions must be expressed wrt robot" << std::endl;
59  return;
60  }
61  pub_cmd_vel.publish(calculate_speeds(msg->point.x, msg->point.y));
62  //if(move_head)
63  //{
64  std_msgs::Float32MultiArray head_poses;
65  head_poses.data.push_back(atan2(msg->point.y, msg->point.x));
66  //head_poses.data.push_back(-0.2);
67  head_poses.data.push_back(-0.8);
68  pub_head_pose.publish(head_poses);
69  //}
70 }
71 void callback_pot_fields(const std_msgs::Float32::ConstPtr& msg){
72 
73  rej_force=msg->data;
74 }
75 
76 void callback_enable(const std_msgs::Bool::ConstPtr& msg)
77 {
78  if(msg->data)
79  {
80  std::cout << "LegFinder.->Enable recevied" << std::endl;
81  sub_legs_pose = n->subscribe("/hri/leg_finder/leg_poses", 1, callback_legs_pose);
82  pub_cmd_vel = n->advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("/hsrb/command_velocity", 1);
83  pub_head_pose = n->advertise<std_msgs::Float32MultiArray>("/manipulation/manip_pln/hd_goto_angles", 1);
84  sub_pot_fields = n->subscribe("/navigation/obs_avoid/pot_fields/rejective_force", 1, callback_pot_fields);
85  }
86  else
87  {
88  sub_legs_pose.shutdown();
89  pub_cmd_vel.shutdown();
90  pub_head_pose.shutdown();
91  sub_pot_fields.shutdown();
92  }
93 }
94 
95 
96 int main(int argc, char** argv)
97 {
98  move_head = false;
99  for(int i=0; i < argc; i++)
100  {
101  std::string strParam(argv[i]);
102  if(strParam.compare("--move_head") == 0)
103  move_head = true;
104  if(strParam.compare("--pot_fields")==0){
105  pot_fields = true;
106  std::cout<<"pot fields activated"<<std::endl;
107  }
108  }
109 
110  std::cout << "INITIALIZING HUMAN FOLLOWER BY MARCOSOFT..." << std::endl;
111  ros::init(argc, argv, "human_follower");
112  n = new ros::NodeHandle();
113  ros::Subscriber sub_enable = n->subscribe("/hri/human_following/start_follow", 1, callback_enable);
114  ros::Rate loop(20);
115 
116 
117  if (n->getParam("/hri/human_following/k_pot_fields", k_linear_y)){
118  ROS_INFO("Got param k_linear_y: %f", k_linear_y);
119  }
120  else{
121  ROS_INFO("Param default k_linear_y: %f", k_linear_y);
122  }
123 
124 
125  while(ros::ok())
126  {
127  ros::spinOnce();
128  loop.sleep();
129  }
130  delete n;
131 }
